bibl.title: Women's Petitions in Late Antique Egypt.

series.title: Centre de Recherche d'Histoire et Civilisation de Byzance. Monographies.

bibl.note: The second half of the fourth century brought with it a diminution, and by the period after 400 a drastic diminution of the women's petitions. Observations on the significance of the phenomena.

bibl.title: La pétition à Byzance. XXe Congrès international des Études byzantines, 19-25 août 2001. Table ronde

bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Women's Petitions in Late Antique Egypt.

Denis FEISSEL et Jean GASCOU (Édd.), La pétition à Byzance. XXe Congrès international des Études byzantines, 19-25 août 2001. Table ronde = Centre de Recherche d'Histoire et Civilisation de Byzance. Monographies. 14 (Paris, 2004) pp. 53-60, 1 tabl.
The second half of the fourth century brought with it a diminution, and by the period after 400 a drastic diminution of the women's petitions. Observations on the significance of the phenomena.
